description:
One of Wrightsock's best selling styles, the lightweight double-layer knit has a minimal feel that suits running, walking or light hiking. The fabric dries fast, so it's a great option for travel too.

  • Dri-WRIGHT II performance fibers provide great moisture management
  • Stabilizer zone in arch keeps them in place
  • Mesh panel for airflow and cooler feet
  • Super-thin design has no cushioning
name: WrightSock Double Layer Coolmesh II Tab Socks - Unisex
